panel.name: center_circle
panel.visibility: not is_video 'active' ? var_not_equal '@$jogcoverart' 1 ? true : not loaded : 0

menu.tooltip: SKIN LAYOUT\nSelect the layout adapted to your mixing style

button.tooltip: AUDIO\nShow the audio (mixer) controls, like equalizers, gain, level, pfl, etc
VIDEO\nShow the video controls, like video previews, source, effects, etc
SCRATCH\nShow a scratch-optimized view with vertical waveforms and scratch options
MASTER\nShow some general controls, like record/broadcast, microphone, or master effects
